pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: Name of the static site.

pathParameters.name: environmentName
pathParameters.description: The stage site identifier.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: Name of the static site.

pathParameters.name: environmentName
pathParameters.description: The stage site identifier.

pathParameters.name: functionAppName
pathParameters.description: Name of the function app registered with the static site build.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: Name of the static site.

pathParameters.name: environmentName
pathParameters.description: The stage site identifier.

pathParameters.name: functionAppName
pathParameters.description: Name of the function app to register with the static site build.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

queryParameters.name: isForced
queryParameters.description: Specify true to force the update of the auth configuration on the function app even if an AzureStaticWebApps provider is already configured on the function app. The default is false.
